description: FemTec Health is the leading health and beauty sciences company focused on women’s healthcare, using technology and data to transform the total healthcare experience for women.

Fever delivers a curated list of the most exciting events and things to do and see in your city. With the US as its largest market, the company has become the leading global tech-enabled entertainment discovery platform with a clear vision: to inspire and connect people through leisure and entertainment experiences.

FintechOS offers its bank and insurance customers a digital overlay platform on top of their existing legacy infrastructure to enable them to design, build and manage next generation end-to-end capabilities.
Firefly is a street-level digital media platform that connects audiences with dynamic media on taxis and rideshare vehicles.

Flat.mx is a Mexican-based Proptech that aims to become the super app for real estate across Latin America. The company is creating an ecosystem, comprised of a full-fledged set of products and services.
Floward is an online flower and gifting company. Founded in 2017, the company’s mission is to “make sending flowers and gifts as enjoyable as receiving them”.
Flutterwave provides seamless and secure payments solutions for global merchants and payment service providers across Africa.
Foodology is disrupting the restaurant industry in LatAm by creating the leading operating platform to scale restaurant delivery brands across the region.
Friday Health Plans is purpose-built for individuals and small businesses who buy their own health insurance, offering simplified and consumer-centric plans at a low cost.

Funding Societies is a digital crowdfunding and financing platform for MSMEs in Southeast Asia. MSMEs can gain access to this capital without needing to put up collateral in a quick (1-10 days) and seamless way.
Gigas offers powerful and advanced real time cloud hosting services with a very simple and intuitive control panel.

Glints is the #1 recruitment platform in Southeast Asia. The company provides a tech-enabled transaction-based skills and career development platform, which leverages data science to search and match candidates according to job requirements, enabling personalized local and cross-border matching at scale.
Leveraging the latest technologies and methodologies, Globant helps organizations transform digitally. Globant went public on the NYSE in 2014.
Spain’s second unicorn, Glovo is an on-demand “deliver anything” app platform that delivers goods ranging from food to other urban conveniences, such as groceries and pharmaceuticals.
Go1 allows companies to upskill their workforce with on-demand training and dynamic content-driven platform.

Great Deals E-Commerce is the Philippines’ leading e-commerce enabler. The company provides an end-to-end ecosystem, equipping global brands with in-depth tools and strategies to maximize their e-commerce efforts in the Filipino market.
Grinta is a managed marketplace that is modernizing the pharmaceutical supply chain by empowering independent pharmacies across Africa through AI & ML technologies.
GrowSari is a tech-enabled B2B platform that helps the Philippines’ over one million mom & pop sari-sari stores get better service, larger assortments, and access to new services.

Grupo Trigo is the largest Brazilian fast-food group. It currently owns 4 chains: Spoleto – Italian food chain, Koni – Japanese food chain, Le Bon Ton – french food chain, and Gurumê – Japanese food casual restaurants.
Gupy offers end-to-end recruitment, selection, and hiring compliance services within a single platform.
